PRODUCT.TITLE: APPLE
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Mcintosh Apple. Can be eaten raw or used in cooking. Classic apple taste.

PRODUCT.TITLE: BANANA
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Yellow Banana. Can be eaten raw or used in cooking. Classic banana taste. Keep away from monkeys and men in yellow hats.

PRODUCT.TITLE: Peach
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Ontarian Peaches. Can be eaten raw or used in cooking. Sweet and juicy, just like the emoji.

PRODUCT.TITLE: STRAWBERRY
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Strawberries grown in Quebec. Sweet summer treat.
